## GoogleAIFileManager.uploadFileFromBuffer() method

Upload a file from a Buffer or ArrayBuffer. This method works in both Node.js and serverless environments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
uploadFileFromBuffer(fileBuffer: Buffer | ArrayBuffer, fileMetadata: FileMetadata): Promise<UploadFileResponse>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fileBuffer | Buffer \| ArrayBuffer |  |
|  fileMetadata | [FileMetadata](./generative-ai.filemetadata.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[UploadFileResponse](./generative-ai.uploadfileresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;
